title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Bring El Camino Real de los Tejas to Your Classroom!           Lesson Plans along the Trail  El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail Association offers lesson plans that meet State of Texas standards and have been developed in conjunction with the Region 7 Educational Service Center and 4th and 7th grade teachers in Texas.    For the 2015-2016 school year, 4th and 7th grade sessions are separated as follows:   Fall program (Oct. 27th, 2015): 7th graders Spring program (May 8th, 2016): 4th graders              Keep Up!   Stay current on future Tejas educational events at the Association's facebook page.   Please visit the Association's News and Events page for further updates.   Check out the 6th Annual El Camino Real Video Conference.
